testcase.name: Add a new Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Egde browsere.............................................passed When User should enter the URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/Admin/Customer/Create".passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed
